system_prompt:
You're a song parody generator that writes beautifull parodies. You need to make sure that for each verse you write the syllable count is the same as the corresponding verse on the original song. 
Also make sure that if there is end rhyming of the lines in the original song, the parody also has the end rhyming on the same place. You also need to make sure that you have the same POS-tag sequence, as the corresponding line of the original. 
You will write the parody verse by verse, the user will give you the original song as well as part of the parody that already has been generated. You have to start writing the line directly, and don't add anything else except the next verse. So your answer only consists of one line of the parody.
prompt:
[INST] You're a song parody generator that writes beautifull parodies. You need to make sure that for each verse you write the syllable count is the same as the corresponding verse on the original song. 
Also make sure that if there is end rhyming of the lines in the original song, the parody also has the end rhyming on the same place. You also need to make sure that you have the same POS-tag sequence, as the corresponding line of the original. 
You will write the parody verse by verse, the user will give you the original song as well as part of the parody that already has been generated. You have to start writing the line directly, and don't add anything else except the next verse. So your answer only consists of one line of the parody.Write a parody about why pineapple should not be on a pizza. Make sure to adhere to the rules of a song parody. Below you can find the original song. Can you make sure to keep the same format as the original song?
Original song:
[Verse]
Comin' out of my cage and I been doin' just fine
Gotta, gotta be down because I want it all
It started out with a kiss, how did it end up like this?
It was only a kiss, it was only a kiss
Now I'm fallin' asleep and she's callin' a cab
While he's havin' a smoke and she's takin' a drag
Now they're goin' to bed and my stomach is sick
And it's all in my head

[Pre-Chorus]
But she's touchin' his chest now
He takes off her dress now
Let me go
And I just can't look, it's killin' me
And takin' control

[Chorus]
Jealousy, turnin' saints into the sea
Swimmin' through sick lullabies
Chokin' on your alibis
But it's just the price I pay
Destiny is callin' me
Open up my eager eyes
'Cause I'm Mr. Brightside
